instructions_to_main_agent: Implement Dark Mode by default. Add 'dark' class to html/body.
Use 'Manrope' for all Headings (h1-h3) and 'Inter' for body text. Add these fonts via Google Fonts.
Sidebar: Fixed width 240px. Use Lucide icons. Highlight active route with subtle Indigo background.
Inbox List: Dense layout. Row height ~64px. Sender Name (Bold), Subject (Regular), Preview (Light Text).
AI Assistant: Floating Action Button (FAB) at bottom right. On click, expand to a chat window.
AI Actions: When AI performs an action (e.g. 'Opening Compose'), show a Toast notification and visually highlight the Compose modal.
Compose Modal: Use a centered modal or bottom-right pane (Gmail style). Minimalist inputs.
Real-time Sync: Add a small pulsing dot (green) in the sidebar to indicate 'Live' connection.
Use Shadcn components for: Dialog (Compose), ScrollArea (List), Avatar (User), Badge (Labels), Input (Search).
Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid Zinc-950 or Zinc-900. Use gradients only for 'AI Magic' borders or buttons.
Accessibility: Ensure text contrast ratio is > 4.5:1. Use lighter grays (zinc-300/400) for secondary text, not dark gray.
universal_guidelines: Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤– etc for icons. Use Lucide icons.
